errors.too-many-redirects: Too many redirects, WS path:__path__, Redirect Location:__location__ (Retry after approx. 1min)
errors.auth-error: Auth error for the path:[__path__] ], User ID:[__user__]
errors.server-error: Server error for the path:[__path__], Status:[__status__] (Retry after approx. 1min)
errors.connect-error: An error occured on the ws connection to __accountFqn__: __err__
errors.send-error: An error occurred while sending a mesage to __accountFqn__: __err__
